## Middleware

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/router/CommandsRouter.ts" sourceLine="22" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a middleware with its metadata and scope.

```ts title="Signature"
interface Middleware {
    id: string;
    name: string;
    path: string;
    relativePath: string;
    parentPath: string;
    global: boolean;
    command: string | null;
}
```
